title: Miley Cyrus flashes abs in a cropped jumper while shopping in LA after BLASTING 'slut-shamers'
text:
She's blasted 'slut-shamers' in a lengthy, passionate statement after receiving backlash following her recent kiss with Cody Simpson.

And after getting things off her chest, Miley Cyrus, 26, looked happy and relaxed as she enjoyed a spot of grocery shopping in Sherman Oaks, California, on Friday night.

The multi-talented star, who has appeared to confirm she's dating Australian hunk Cody, flashed a peek of her undeniably toned abs in a cropped hoodie as she carted along a trolley full of food.

Chilling: Miley Cyrus, 26, looked happy and relaxed as she enjoyed a spot of grocery shopping in Sherman Oaks, California, on Friday night after blasting 'slut-shamers'

Miley teamed her trendy look with a pair of casual baggy denims, and opted for maximum comfort in a pair of flat black shoes.

The former Disney star relied on her naturally striking features with a simple slick of make-up, which complemented her flowing blonde locks.

Her low-key sighting comes after she took to Instagram to stick up for herself after putting an amorous display with singer Cody - who previously dated Gigi Hadid.

The Wrecking Ball singer first began by showing some love for Simpson, in which she included a topless snap of him.

Trendy: The star, who has appeared to confirm she's dating Australian hunk Cody Simpson, flashed a peek of her toned abs in a cropped hoodie

Looking good: Miley teamed her trendy look with a pair of casual baggy denims, and opted for maximum comfort in a pair of flat black shoes

She added a gushing checklist, listing out the hunk's credentials: his age, Australian nationality (which she mentioned is 'my type'), and his 'abs'.

Miley then began he passionate statement, which read: 'I know the public feels invested in my past relationship [with ex Liam Hemsworth] because they felt like they saw it thru from the beginning,' the star began her longer confessional.

'I think that's why people have always felt so entitled over my life and how I live it because they've watched me grow up.'

'But I am grown now,' Cyrus continued, 'and make choices as an adult knowing the truth/details/reality.' People only "know" what they see on the internet.'

Loving life: Miley looked like she was having a whale of a time as she was seen kissing Cody recently

'Can't I just have a kiss and an acai bowl?' She's blasted 'slut-shamers' in a lengthy, passionate statement after receiving backlash following her recent kiss with Cody Simpson

Miley also addressed the inequity of how famous women are portrayed in their pursuit of love and intimacy, as compared to famous men.

'Men (especially successful ones) are RARELY slut shamed. They move on from one beautiful woman to the next MOST times without consequence. They are referred to as "legends", "heart throbs",' she continued, 'where women are called sluts/whores! I am trying to just THRIVE/survive in a "mans" world.'

'If we can't beat em, join em!' Miley concluded the section. 'If our president can "grab em by the p***y..." can't I just have a kiss and acai bowl?!?!'

After specifically responding to being recently spotted kissing Cody, she addressed the budding relationship on the next screen of her Instagram story.

'Hot Girl Fall': The Wrecking Ball singer first began by showing some love for Simpson, in which she included a topless snap of him.

'I refuse to recluse and "date" from home cause A. That's not fun B. Extremely uncomfortable/puts me in a vulnerable position,' the Slide Away performer expressed.

'I would like to share an activity with someone I am dating and not be stuck at home with pretty much nothing to do but "Netflix and chill".

'This "dating" thing is new to me too. I've never been an "adult"/grown a** woman experiencing this... I was in a committed relationship for almost All my teens and early 20s; with the exception of a few breaks, which usually in those times I was working my a** off with not much R&R... and "meeting/trusting" people in my position is really tuff.'

Claiming what's hers: Another of Miley's adoring snaps of Cody on her Instagram story on Friday

'Don't f***ing pity me, not what I'm asking for,' Miley concluded. 'I have a great life I wouldn't trade for "privacy" but PLEASE don't make this awkward for me! I am trying to make light and like always MAKE FUN of myself/and the public's perception of me! Get used to me dating – this is where I am at!'

This isn't the first time the singer has used social media to vent.

Shortly after her split from Liam Hemsworth was made public late this summer, Cyrus made a public statement on Twitter an Instagram that revealed some of her feelings about the split, and how it was important for her to set the record straight.

Ex: Miley's split from Liam became public late this summer after they married in December of last year

Splitsville: Meanwhile, Miley's supposed new romance with Cody comes just two weeks after her split from Kaitlynn Carter following their whirlwind romance

'At this point I had to make a healthy decision for myself to leave a previous life behind,' she tweeted on August 22.

'I am the healthiest and happiest I have been in a long time. You can say I am a twerking, pot smoking , foul mouthed hillbilly but I am not a liar.'

Meanwhile, Miley's supposed new romance with Cody comes just two weeks after her split from Kaitlynn Carter following their whirlwind romance.
